name: Have 20 unfused Pokes
Have a Poke with exactly 50 Attack
Breed an egg and hatch it
Defeat a trainer only using Counter or Mirror Coat
Toss a Lucky Egg
Catch or faint Entei encounter
Defeat a Gym Leader with only Ground Type Pokes
Use a stone to evolve a Poke
Fuse two different baby pokes together
Have your Poke faint due to its own move
Defeat Robot R.E.D. without statuses
Defeat Sabrina before Koga
Defeat a Gym Leader with only Ghost Type Pokes
Defeat all trainers in Rocket Sewer (14)
Use a Rare Candy to revive a fainted Poke
Obtain 10 hidden items on the overworld
Defeat all Cerulean Gym trainers (3)
Have at least $100,000
Obtain 15 different TMs
Defeat a Poke using Struggle
Complete 5 different trades (no wonder trade)
Complete 15 Hotel Quests
Do Rock Tunnel without using Repel items
Inflict an opposing Poke with poison
Have a Poke with a stat value lower than its level
